Member Function Documentation

static IGlue* start ( int  timeInterval,
int  udpport,
int  outport,
int  errport,
QApplication *  appl,
bool  offscreen = false 
) [static]

Qt environment initialization + INScore glue setup.

Parameters:
timeIntervalthe time task tme interval (in mls). 0 means no time task
udpportthe udp port number to listen for incoming OSC messages
outportthe udp port number for outgoing OSC messages
errportthe udp port number for error messages
offscreena boolean value to select between onscreen and offscreen graphic rendering. When offscreen is selected, the graphic rendering is in charge of the client application, which should set a listener to be notified of the graphic score changes, which should also use the getGraphicScore method to get the score bitmap.
See also:
GraphicUpdateListener
static void stop ( IGlue *  glue ) [static]

stops the INScore services

Parameters:
gluethe value returned by the last start call

static void postMessage ( const char *  address,
MessagePtr  msg 
) [static]

post a message

Parameters:
addressthe OSC destination address of the message
msgthe message to send
Warning:
once a message has been posted, it is owned by the library and must not be deleted by the client application
static void delayMessage ( const char *  address,
MessagePtr  msg 
) [static]

post a message for delayed processing i.e. its processing is delayed by one time task

Parameters:
addressthe OSC destination address of the message
msgthe message to send
Warning:
once a message has been posted, it is owned by the library and must not be deleted by the client application
